name: XOLT
summary:
- WARNING - Playing XOLT might increase your IQ!  
  
XOLT is an addictive number puzzle game inspired by 2048 and Chess, with levels, upgrades, achievements in a beautiful Stonehenge theme.  
  
- HOW TO PLAY -  
+ Join the same numbers  
+ Collect Gold stones  
+ Join long chains  
+ Choose upgrades wisely  
  
- FEATURES -  
+ Simple yet challenging game play  
+ Clever way to combine chains  
+ 4 Different movement stones  
+ 4 Levels to complete  
+ Powerful upgrades  
+ Fun achievements
